mapper.sql: select SPECIAL_REPORT_ID, PLAN_ID, REPORT_TYPE,APPROVAL_FLAG, APPROVER_ID,APPROVER_NAME,CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME, ENT_ID from inspection_special_report
mapper.select: select SPECIAL_REPORT_ID, PLAN_ID, REPORT_TYPE, s.CREATED_BY as 'o_CREATED_BY', s.CREATED_TIME as 'o_CREATED_TIME', s.UPDATED_BY as 'o_UPDATED_BY', s.UPDATED_TIME as 'o_UPDATED_TIME', s.ENT_ID as 'o_ENT_ID', APPROVER_ID,APPROVER_NAME,APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID, doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_special_report s left join piis_document doc on concat('SpecialReport', s.SPECIAL_REPORT_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where PLAN_ID = #{planId} and UNITS_ID = #{unitsId} order by s.CREATED_TIME desc

select SPECIAL_REPORT_ID, PLAN_ID, REPORT_TYPE, s.CREATED_BY as 'o_CREATED_BY', s.CREATED_TIME as 'o_CREATED_TIME', s.UPDATED_BY as 'o_UPDATED_BY', s.UPDATED_TIME as 'o_UPDATED_TIME', s.ENT_ID as 'o_ENT_ID', APPROVER_ID,APPROVER_NAME,APPROVAL_FLAG, doc.PIIS_DOC_ID doc.OBJECT_ID, doc.FILE_DICT_ID, doc.FILE_NAME, doc.FILE_SIZE, doc.FILE_PATH from inspection_special_report s left join piis_document doc on concat('SpecialReport', s.SPECIAL_REPORT_ID) = doc.OBJECT_ID where s.SPECIAL_REPORT_ID = #{specialReportId}

select u.UNITS_ID,u.ORG_ID,u.ORG_NAME,u.created_time,count(r.UNITS_ID) as count from inspection_units u left join inspection_special_report r on u.UNITS_ID = r.UNITS_ID where u.plan_id = #{planId} group by u.UNITS_ID
